channel.title: Fight pits
channel.description: i got a little porblem wish i need some help, in fight pits if you go in you get a coutn down i added in an interface but the thing is that it dosent matter if it is only 1 player in it will still say you are the winner and you get the price. so how do i make so you need 2 people in or more to get in the game?
